definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to live in the moment (idiom)/to live every day as if it were one's last/to enjoy while one can
pinyin: jin1 zhao1 you3 jiu3 jin1 zhao1 zui4

definition: to live in the moment (idiom)/to live every day as if it were one's last/to enjoy while one can
pinyin: jin1 zhao1 you3 jiu3 jin1 zhao1 zui4

sentences.english: It is a jiffy after three.
Live, pluck the roses of the world to-day.
sentences.chinese: 生活吧，趁今朝趕緊採下那世俗的玫瑰。

sentences.english: He has never rested on his laurels.
sentences.chinese: 他從不饜足今朝的成績。

sentences.english: Bottle turn the star moves, years alternate, old E Er is much this now is changed new colour.
sentences.chinese: 斗轉星移，歲月更迭，古老的鄂爾多斯今朝換新顏。

sentences.english: At present, our company mainly engaged in grid and off-grid system.
sentences.chinese: 今朝我公司主要經營併網和離網系統。

sentences.english: What I should do at present is learn English well.
sentences.chinese: 我今朝應該做的工作是學好英語。

sentences.english: Does the past provide lessons for the present, guidance for the future?
sentences.chinese: 過去是否爲今朝提供借鑑，是否對未來做出指引？

sentences.english: Lactose is also not present in soy-based formulas.
sentences.chinese: 乳糖是今朝還沒有在年夜豆爲根底的公式。

sentences.english: Also like today banquet song, Baitouweng in a young field.
sentences.chinese: 還似今朝歌酒席，白頭翁入少年場。

sentences.english: No Product on the Market Can Compare!
sentences.chinese: 今朝市道沒有別的產物比它更好。

sentences.english: Hi. Jair coolingk. where do you live now?
sentences.chinese: 你好，傑克，你今朝住哪兒？

sentences.english: When the fish three feet, not like today bean taste sweet.
sentences.chinese: 當年此會魚三尺，不似今朝豆味香。

sentences.english: New couples will tie the knot in the beautiful French-style garden within the pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 而今朝，新婚夫婦將在國館的大方的園中喜結良緣。

sentences.english: Wre not prepared to take the agency into consideration for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 今朝我們還不籌備考慮代辦署理問題。

sentences.english: This morning, recalling the grave, I went to pay a visit to it.
sentences.chinese: 我今朝回想起來，又一人走來憑弔。

sentences.english: Two hundred trees haudio-videoe been plinitiing ished by now.
sentences.chinese: 到今朝爲止，曾經種了二百棵樹了。
